name: TX_ANES_TIMES
description: The TX_ANES_TIMES table contains information concerning the date and times for an anesthesia charge.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique key or identification number for a given transaction.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: This column contains the line count for the information in this table. Each anesthesia time/date range is stored on a separate line, one line for each range.

columns.name: START_TIME
columns.description: Start time of the anesthesia procedure.

columns.name: START_DATE
columns.description: Start date of the anesthesia procedure.

columns.name: END_TIME
columns.description: End time of the anesthesia procedure.

columns.name: END_DATE
columns.description: End date of the anesthesia procedure.
